name: CountdowntoGameofThrones
0:
”Alexa, countdown game of thrones”
”Alexa, open countdown game of thrones”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: countdown game of thrones
des:
This Alexa skill countdown to the air date of season 8 of HBO's Game of Thrones.
On each run it will countdown in either days, hours, minutes or seconds.
The date that is used is estimated date.
Once a date will be confirmed, the skill will be updated accordingly.
